detail_desc: Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a woven wool blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
Mules with open toes, satin linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Leggings in jersey made from a cotton blend. Regular waist with covered elastication. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.

Calf-length dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a unique nursing feature. V-neck, short sleeves, a wide tie belt under the bust, and slits in the sides. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight viscose jersey with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, fluffy velour with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 2-3Y with normal sequins). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Blouse in airy plumeti chiffon with a lace-trimmed collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, a small flounce at the shoulders and a seam at the top with decorative gathers. Long sleeves with a frill trim and button at the cuffs. Unlined.

Set with a dress and matching bolero. Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt that is slightly longer at the back. Unlined. Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped button at the top.

Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif at the top and a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.
Wide trousers in sequined mesh. High waist with concealed elastication and super-wide legs. Fully lined.
Lightweight trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and tapered legs. One pair with an all-over print.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cashmere with a high collar, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets, inner pockets and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, covered elastication at the waist and a lined front.
Long-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie/bow tie.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Contrasting colour trims around the neckline and sleeves.
Cold shoulder dress in sturdy, glittery jersey with a flounce at the top, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.

Knee-length cargo shorts in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets with decorative seams, flap back pockets with concealed press-studs and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs.
Straight-cut shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and short sleeves. Unlined.

Lightly padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a zip fly and press-studs and adjustable hook and loop tabs at the waist. Zipped side pockets, a flap back pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and shaping seams at the knees for best fit. Reinforced hems and snow flaps with reinforced elastication at the hems. Lined. Detachable, elasticated braces that cross at the back. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Calf-length, 5-pocket skirt in cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slit at the front. Unlined.
Gilet in supersoft faux fur with a concealed fastening at the top. Lined.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.
Playsuit in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft, patterned jersey. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and overlocked hems.
Fully lined, off-the-shoulder swimsuit with two flounced at the top and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Silicone trim around the top.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey.

Short dress in an airy weave with pin-tucks at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, bell-shaped skirt, and lace details at the cuffs and hem. Jersey inner dress.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elastication at the hems.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
Joggers in soft, organic cotton jersey with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a linen and cotton blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a flounced hem with a double flounce at the front. Lined.

Long dress in sequin-embroidered mesh with defined shoulders and a deep V-neck with draping and a decorative knot detail at the waist. Long sleeves with shoulder pads and a slit and sparkly-stone button at the cuffs. Heavily draping skirt with a slit at the front and slightly longer back that creates a train. Concealed zip in one side and an open back with a sparkly-stone button at the back of the neck. Trim in raw-edge sheer fabric at the neckline, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Double-layered, one-shoulder top woven in an airy cotton-blend with narrow elastication and two flounces at the top, and zigzag edges.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length, gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Tunic in an airy, patterned weave with a round neck and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Seam under the bust. Partly lined.
Cardigan in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders, front pockets and no buttons.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric, zip down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Top in printed cotton jersey with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Treggings in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Dungaree shorts in washed cotton denim with adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Shoulder bag in shiny, crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a flap and detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Four larger compartments, one of which fastens with a flap and press-stud and one with a zip. One smaller inner compartment. Lined. Size 7.5x15x23 cm.
Jacket in imitation suede with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a small imitation leather appliqué on the chest. Wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring, a kangaroo pocket, long sleeves with contrasting colour side stripes, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot, decorative bow at the front, grosgrain trim around the top edge and a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wide top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.

Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with buttons at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Front and back pockets, a cat-shaped chest pocket with embroidery, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Wide dress in an airy, textured weave with a round, gathered neckline, dropped shoulders and short, wide puff sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a drawstring at the waist with narrow ties at the front. Skirt with inset sections at the sides for added volume and a shorter front. V-neck jersey underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back, inner shorts and straight, wide legs with scalloped, broderie anglaise trims at the hems.
Short coat in imitation suede with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, welt side pockets and no fasteners. Satin lining.

Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with frill-trimmed, elasticated shoulder straps and a wrapover front with flounces at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flounced trim at the hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Beret in a felted wool blend with a faux fur pompom on the top. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Slim-fit, high-waisted, calf-length jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets, and straight-cut hems with short slits in the sides.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in a soft viscose weave. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the hem. Shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and a frill trim at the hem.
Shorts in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with pleats at the front and wide, covered elastication at the back, and diagonal side pockets.
Fine-knit top with a soft, brushed finish. Stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long, ribbed sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Long satin dress with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short trumpet sleeves. Double-layered bodice, an elasticated seam with ties at the waist and an asymmetric skirt. Short underskirt.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Top with long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with cuffed hems.
Ballet pumps in shimmering imitation leather with a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles.
Dungarees in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, press-studs at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners.
Bralette in lace and mesh with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and press-stud cuffs.
Shaping bikers in microfibre with a high waist and lined gusset. The bikers have a light sculpting effect on the tummy and thighs and a push-up effect on the bum with the help of removable inserts.
Pull-on jeans in soft, superstretch denim with jersey ribbing at the waist and a fake fly with a decorative button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs.

Fully lined cargo trousers in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Flap front and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, fake back pockets with a decorative sewn-on flap, and shaped, tapered legs. Jersey lining.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover at the front, covered elastication at the waist and overlocked edges. Longer at the back. Unlined.
